title: ICE on default method with argument with type but no pattern

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
trait Foo {
    fn bar(&self, int) {} /* should be `x: int` */
}

fn main() {}
```

